mapper.insert: insert into tbl_member(member_userid, fk_child_dept_no, member_pwd, member_name, member_mobile, member_email,member_birthday, member_gender, member_start, member_pro_filename, member_pro_orgfilename, member_pro_filesize,member_yeoncha, member_grade, member_workingTime, member_position) values(#{member_userid}, #{fk_child_dept_no}, #{member_pwd}, #{member_name}, #{member_mobile}, #{member_email},#{member_birthday}, #{member_gender}, #{member_start}, #{member_pro_filename}, #{member_pro_orgfilename}, #{member_pro_filesize}, #{member_yeoncha}, #{member_grade}, #{member_workingTime}, #{member_position})
mapper.select: SELECT member_userid, fk_child_dept_no, child_dept_name , member_name, member_mobile, member_email,member_birthday, member_gender, member_start, member_last, member_pro_filename, member_pro_orgfilename, member_pro_filesize, member_yeoncha, member_grade, member_workingTime, member_position, member_sign_filename, member_sign_orgfilename, member_sign_filesize from tbl_member m JOIN TBL_CHILD_DEPT c ON m.fk_CHILD_DEPT_NO = c.CHILD_DEPT_NO where member_userid = to_number(#{member_userid}) and member_pwd = ${member_pwd}

select count(*) from tbl_member
where lower(member_userid) like '%'|| lower(#{searchWord}) ||'%'
where lower(member_position) like '%'|| lower(#{searchWord}) ||'%'
where lower(member_name) like '%'|| lower(#{searchWord}) ||'%'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY m.MEMBER_START DESC) AS RNO, m.member_userid, m.MEMBER_START, m.fk_child_dept_no, c.child_dept_name, m.member_name, m.member_gender, m.member_pro_filename, m.member_position FROM tbl_member m JOIN TBL_CHILD_DEPT c ON m.fk_CHILD_DEPT_NO = c.CHILD_DEPT_NO
where lower(member_userid) like '%'|| lower(#{searchWord}) ||'%'
where lower(member_position) like '%'|| lower(#{searchWord}) ||'%'
where lower(member_name) like '%'|| lower(#{searchWord}) ||'%'
) V WHERE rno BETWEEN to_number(#{startRno}) AND to_number(#{endRno})

SELECT member_position
SELECT member_name
